name: TheOfficeTrivia
0:
”Alexa, start the office trivia”
”Alexa, begin the office trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the office trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Test and practice your knowledge of the hit TV show The Office (the US version). Simply say "Start The Office Trivia" to begin. 

Divide into teams or play by yourself! Write your answers on a piece of paper, then ask Alexa for the correct answer. 
Keep score for your teams and stop at any time.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
